description: AI-powered workflow that generates comprehensive multi-platform content strategies with summaries, titles, key points, and platform-specific posts
name: Content Planner Agent
long_description:
that helps creators, marketers, and brands develop comprehensive content strategies across all major platforms.

This workflow assists you in:
- Generating strategic topic summaries that highlight value and opportunity
- Creating 5 engaging, platform-agnostic title suggestions
- Identifying 6-8 key talking points and content angles
- Recommending optimal posting schedules with frequency and timing
- Producing platform-specific content ideas for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn, X (Twitter), Threads, and Blog

The workflow automatically invokes the contentPlannerTool when you provide a topic or niche. You can optionally specify target audience and content goals for more personalized recommendations.

Best for: Content creators, social media managers, marketing teams, entrepreneurs, and anyone building a multi-platform content presence.
short_description: Generate AI-powered content plans with summaries, titles, and platform-specific strategies.
